description: This section contains some of my projects, whenever I build something, I always seek to learn as much as possible, exposing my self to new technologies and tools. I also try to document and summarize though process behind each one project, so for more information about development process check out case studies.

description.short: skyAtlas is a progressive web application for stargazing enthusiasts, helping to indentify and observe celestial objects in the sky.
description.long: Learn about the history, mythology and science as you explore Milky Way. Presented with rich graphics and multitude of interesting information.
features: Stars, planets and constellatons in real time!
Huge database of 119,617 stars, with precise location, magnitude and spectrum.
Mobile sensor support - just point your device
Control what you see by toggling objects, helpers and adjusting magnitude.
description.technical: skyAtlas was built with vanilla Javascript, leveraging graphic acceleration with WebGL and three.js library. Stellar data is derrived from various sources mainly HYG 3.0 Database, NASA JPL and Wikipedia.

description.short: strongLyfts is a workout assisting application based on popular 5x5 program.
dietHelper is fully automated meal planner.
